website_summaries.verdict: Most fans of these nutrition bars are thrilled with their flavor and energy-boosting ingredients; however, the flavor or price isn't for everyone.
pros: Packed with organic protein-rich ingredients without preservatives, cane sugar, or added unnatural ingredients
cons: Pricier than others on our list, but not necessarily more flavorful than contenders
Some consumers complained of receiving stale bars or packages with a few missing

customer_reviews.title: be careful if you order this
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a box of 12 of these bars. what did I receive- 1 bar . why would I pay 30.11 for one protein bar. I can't even return the one bar for my money back . so if your looking for this product go to someone else . This isn't anything but a joke. I'm furious
customer_reviews.author: ROBERT HANSEN

customer_reviews.title: Current box had MOLDY bars!
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered these several times for my son who loves them. This last shipment that he received last weekend had many MOLDY bars in the box! The expiration on the box says Feb. 12, 2018. I was surprised that the box had such a narrow window of best-by eating, if it expires in February and I JUST ordered them. Unacceptable. Any ideas on how I get a replacement box??
customer_reviews.author: David J. Sampson

customer_reviews.title: Beware of stones!!! They will chip your teeth!
customer_reviews.text: Love the bars except there have been at least 6 times where my husband or I was chewing and pebbles/stones have crammed into my fillings and one just chipped off my husbands tooth while at work. This is unacceptable and want a refund and the company to contact me.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer S

customer_reviews.title: ... box that was expired full of mold I’m not happy
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered these bars for almost a year now and I Received my first box that was expired full of mold I’m not happy
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Church

customer_reviews.title: Product is stale
customer_reviews.text: This product is sold & shipped by Amazon. While I've had no issues buying this product from a grocery store, it's not the same buying them on Amazon. I'm not sure how Amazon stores food products, but I reckon they do not have air conditioned facilities. Although the expiry date for the product is around Dec '19, the macrobar I received smells stale and tastes like an old product. I've cancelled by food-related subscriptions and I urge you to do the same if you want quality food products.
customer_reviews.author: Sagaboy

customer_reviews.title: They taste good, they are organic and that is very important ...
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered two boxes of this product. They taste good, they are organic and that is very important to me. But they have pieces of What appears to be shells from peanuts in them. A couple of times it really hurt my tooth and makes me a little afraid to eat these🙁 It does say that on the package that it may contain pit or nut shells. But having two boxes of these bars there's quite a bit in each bar. It is a little excessive in my opinion. Just a word of caution while eating these.
customer_reviews.author: Jewelz

customer_reviews.title: Great Protein Bar for Ppl with Digestive Issues
customer_reviews.text: I first purchased these bars at my neighborhood health food store when I was on the unfortunate Low Fodmap Diet due to digestive issues. I was constantly hungry on the diet and looking for something that would not exacerbate my condition. These bars were my go-to and remain to this day, even though I am no longer on a restricted died. As a super active person, it has been a life-long hunt for an amazing protein bar that isn't packed with sugar. This feels like a good compromise. The peanut butter chocolate is my favorite. It is great for breakfast or a late dinner.
customer_reviews.author: thoughtful thoughts

customer_reviews.title: Great taste/$1500 dentist bill!
customer_reviews.text: These are great tasting protein bars. The problem arises when you chew them. I noticed something that felt like a stone. When I examined it, it looked like maybe a small piece of a nutshell. The bars were so good, I decided it must be okay since they were still being sold. A chipped tooth and $1,500 later, my mind has changed! After reading this, if you still want to try one, just be careful!!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Mary Davis

customer_reviews.title: Yummy alternative to cheap food
customer_reviews.text: I usually purchase these from my local health food store, but with the shutdown, I decided to try Amazon. I'm thrilled I can get these on subscription; the Banana, is one of my favorites; & I don't even care for bananas. I have several other flavors on order. These bars are great for on the go, or just as a snack. I relied heavily on them when I was traveling for a month. Saved me a lot of money that might've been spent on not-so-great food. Stash easily. Kept me going.
customer_reviews.author: ChaCha Dodds

customer_reviews.title: 💯 recommended!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot even begin to tell you how many protein bars I have tried before falling hard for this one. They were too crunchy, too sweet, not enough natural ingredients, disgusting stevia after taste, not enough protein, no eggs, not organic, too processed. Of all the protein bars I have tried (cliff, quest, nature valley, think thin, kind, Luna) go macro wins hands down. Their banana almond butter is by far my favorite and I stock up when they have their sales. My husband and I love the bars and cannot recommend them enough!
customer_reviews.author: Soumya Anantharaman

customer_reviews.title: meh
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan. I dont eat nuts or eggs or i am always really excited when i find a bar without either of those. I was so happy to come across this so i ordered it and when it came i immediately dug in. the texture is okay, but the flavor was exactly what i would imagine a fart to taste like. cant taste the sunbutter or the chocolate. disappointed. i reallly wanted to love them. now i have a huge box of them and only one is gone.....i am struggling to throw it away because i spent so much on it.
customer_reviews.author: tyler moorhouse

customer_reviews.title: Not what it seems
customer_reviews.text: Love this bar. Would not recommend buying from this company. I got 1 bar for the $33, not 10 like the description said. I even research the comments prior to purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: EH

customer_reviews.title: Delicious AND nutritious !
customer_reviews.text: My complaint about many energy bars is the flavored-sawdust quality, but these Go Macro bars are moist, flavorful, PLUS nutritious with organic, vegan , and gluten-free ingredients. They are somewhat sticky, I don't hold them in my hand without the wrapper, that's for sure. My favorite way to eat them is with a spread of peanut butter on top, but they are plenty flavorful on their own, and have a decent 11 gm.s of protein per bar. A little expensive but much more affordable on Amazon. OH, BTW, I really appreciate the box they come in - appears to be recycled-cardboard- type material, NOT plastic :)
customer_reviews.author: Blues Fan

customer_reviews.title: My daily breakfast
customer_reviews.text: I eat one of these for breakfast almost every day. Easy to keep in my desk, tasty, filling, gives good amount of protein, and goes well with coffee. Have tried other flavors but PB Choc Chip is my favorite. I also keep the mini size around if I need an afternoon snack, keeps me away from the vending machine. I've tried other brands but I come back to Go Macro every time. The texture is nice and soft so you won't break a tooth while enjoying the bar. The size of the bar is perfect for me. I will continue to support this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Too Many Hard Shells
customer_reviews.text: Every bar I ate had a nut shell in it. I tried different flavors and it didn't matter, I always bit into a hard shell. Yuck! I got tired of worrying about breaking a tooth. Need better quality control. Once in a while, I can understand, but every bar? I gave up even though I like the bars.
customer_reviews.author: JK-Foslom,CA

customer_reviews.title: Stale
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed. I’ve been ordering these for over a year and had to throw away half of the box- stale. Even though expiration date is June 2020. Not sure what happened, maybe a storing problem? Not a cheap product. I am afraid to order here again.
customer_reviews.author: Ena

customer_reviews.title: lack value
customer_reviews.text: I like the bars but they don't provide enough value to justify the price. I have purchase over 10 boxes of these from Amazon. But the cost has changed and the product has not improved to warrant the increased price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good, could use a little tweak, otherwise well pleased with these
customer_reviews.text: I like that they don't have chia, flax kr sesame seeds because those feed Candida and a lot of people like me have issues with Candida overgrowth causing all sorts of health problems! The banana almond butter are good, except they could use some Pink Himalayan salt for flavor and salt is actually necessary for a all body functions and the only other thing I can think of for a better nutritional profile would be adding some chicory root fiber
customer_reviews.author: kayB83

customer_reviews.title: Best and most tasty protein bar out there
customer_reviews.text: I love go macro bars as they are very easy for me to digest and provide the energy that I need. I had ca which left me with various gi issues in that I had a very restricted diet- no sugar alcohol, no dates for sweeteners etc. I then developed sibo methane, even more restrictive diet and these bars were like eating a giant chocolate bar after a while. Easy to digest as no insulin or chickory root so sibo and FODMAP friendly. This is my favorite flavor and is on auto fill every month.
customer_reviews.author: GJH

customer_reviews.title: Tasty and good for many allergy issues (yes, contains nuts)
customer_reviews.text: I know rice syrup is the #1 ingredient but it is hard to get a bar that is dairy-free, egg-free, oat-free, soy-free, chia-free, flax-free with some protein and fiber that tastes and travels decently. This meets my requirements. (Of course I like the flavor a with a bit of chocolate in therm a bit better but this has with more protein so I keep more of these in the mix.)
customer_reviews.author: Lady

customer_reviews.title: They were good when they were less expensive.
customer_reviews.text: For someone with allergies this would have been a goto protein bar but the price has gone up by $5.00 in the past few months in an effort to get people to subscribe. Shame shame! These bars were already pricey.
customer_reviews.author: I love Amazon

customer_reviews.title: disappointing change (peanut butter)
customer_reviews.text: they changed the the ‘protein replenishment’ peanut butter bar by reducing the protein & adding more sugar & fat. the old bar had 10 g fat, 11 g sugar, 12 g protein and now it has 11 g fat, 12 g sugar, 11 g protein. i did a side-by-side taste test and the new bar did indeed taste a bit sweeter and less peanut buttery. i prefer the old bar, and because 11 g of sugar is the upper limit of sugar for me, i cancelled my subscribe & save. so disappointing. also as of 3-10-2020, GoMacro hasn’t updated the nutrition facts on their website.
customer_reviews.author: gardenspirit

customer_reviews.title: Yummy and Good for People with Food Allergies
customer_reviews.text: Out of all the Go Macro Bars, this is by far my favorite flavor. They are great for a light breakfast or a snack and do not contain allergens such as gluten and dairy. I also like their chewy texture - it isn't hard or crispy.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Moldy Bar!
customer_reviews.text: Normally these are my go-to bars as a teacher and now working from home with a young family. Every bar has been wonderful, except this morning I took a bite, noticed a moldy smell and looked closely at the side of the bar to see a discoloring. So I’m sending the picture to warn others to check the quality of the bar before consuming. Maybe it was just this bar, but hopefully not the whole box ordered? Hoping for a refund, but I still wish to order more bars. Just a bad, moldy bar for some reason! (Picture available upon request)
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: well balanced bar
customer_reviews.text: I love these bars. I loved them more when they were 24 dollars for a box of 12 bars instead of now being 30. I bought them at Trader Joes a month and a half ago for 2 dollars. Why have they gotten more expensive??
customer_reviews.author: healthy 63

customer_reviews.title: Yum, yum, yum!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these, but need to watch my money. I have food stamps, but can't buy these at a low price making USE of my EBT, alas, so it's far and few between that I will order GoMacro Vegan Protein Bars, sigh.
customer_reviews.author: Susie V Kaufman

customer_reviews.title: Perhaps the best snack bar on the market
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best 'on the go' type of snack bars as they are filling, taste good and are organic. Many similar products appear to be healthy but contain hidden ingredients. This is non GMO, no soy and no MSG variants. These are not the cheapest option but it is the classic example of 'you get what you pay for'.
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Not so healthy bar
customer_reviews.text: Do your research on the brown rice syrup ingredient. The company claims the bar is so healthy but they don't tell you how unhealthy brown rice syrup is, its worse than sugar. Brown-rice syrup also has a high glycemic index (98), meaning it causes your blood sugar to spike quickly. (White sugar, or sucrose, has a glycemic index of 65.)
customer_reviews.author: P❤J

customer_reviews.title: Good for me
customer_reviews.text: Despite all the negative reviews, I took a chance and purchased the chocolate with almond. The bars are fresh and I’ve found no mold. They taste better than the bars from my local health store, which I’ve been purchasing for 2+ years.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: GoMacro organic protein bars
customer_reviews.text: These are some of my favorite bars out there. They are vegan and very clean for those like me who watch their calories, sugars, saturated fats and all every single day. Macro bars taste incredible and work great as a part of my morning breakfast or snack in a day. The calories are higher but that’s expected in any bar using nuts as the primary sourced ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Jaycoub

customer_reviews.title: Some bars too hard to chew
customer_reviews.text: VERY disappointed with these. First time I’ve ordered this new flavor. had to throw away 3 bars so far as they are too hard to chew !! Don’t know about remaining 2 bars. That’s a pretty high percentage out of 12 total and for the price of $30 a very poor value. I will not purchase theses again. I had it on subscribe and save as I also order Cherries & berries on a regular basis.
customer_reviews.author: Narni Miller

customer_reviews.title: Expired products
customer_reviews.text: The macrobars in this box are all dried up and do not taste good at all! We’ve ordered several from amazon and have had a few packages expired or not tasting good.
customer_reviews.author: Becky G.

customer_reviews.title: GoMacro MacroBar Organic Vegan Protein Bars
customer_reviews.text: I buy them for my health conscientious daughter in college. She eats them on the go and during her hectic school days and she loves them. I don't care for the taste and or the chewing sensation personally - not to mention you need to chew them well and wash them down with plenty of water and/or your desired drink. They are EXPENSIVE!
customer_reviews.author: F. Shoar

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and satisfies hunger
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful for satisfying hunger and leave me feeling like I got what I needed. They're delicious and, my favorite part, not too sweet!! The texture is very chewy, kinda more like your typical protein bar, but these are phenomenally better than any other protein bar I've had. I was a Cliff bar survivor for years and years but needed something with less soy. Highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Writing these because all the recent reviews are negative
customer_reviews.text: I’ll start by saying I already knew I liked these bars- I used to work at a health food store and these are my favorite bar and favorite flavor in the line. The quality is amazing, they’re soft like they should be. They came exactly how they’re supposed to and don’t expire for 7 months. Definitely worth it and will be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle

customer_reviews.title: healthy and tastes good. Most bars are too sweet and don't hold ...
customer_reviews.text: As someone always on the go and traveling, I need a bar that is sustaining, healthy and tastes good. Most bars are too sweet and don't hold me over as a meal. But this bar is really tasty, not too sugary where it spikes your blood sugar, and is hearty enough to hold me over until I get a meal.
customer_reviews.author: littlesurfboard

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: These bars are quite addicting. I've tried some of the other flavors, but the peanut butter choc chip is my favorite. It's not too often that I can find a gluten-free bar which is really tasty. I have one most mornings and am completely satisfied until lunch.
customer_reviews.author: Rainey S.

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: I don't mind paying for good clean quality food like this. The sunflower butter and chocolate is tasty. Packed with a good amount of protein. Plan to try more in future. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: bigredpirate

customer_reviews.title: Love the Macrobars but I don’t appreciate receiving old ones
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought various Macrobars on Amazon but I’m steering clear from third party sellers even with Amazon Prime. I suggest to everyone buying Macrobars on Amazon to try an order from the manufacturer. They offer a promo to first time customers. I couldn’t believe how much softer and fresh they were.
customer_reviews.author: Annie B

customer_reviews.title: 1 year old expiration date
customer_reviews.text: Box arrived with a year old expiration date. Did not realize until half way through eating a bar (little harder than usual so I Checked the expiration date). How does one that’s shipping product not know if something is over 1 year past the expiration date!!! Very poor quality control and this seems to be a common problem with Amazon! Never will order again. Pay a little extra at Whole Foods and you can check date before purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: emily p burns

customer_reviews.title: GoMacro decieving, too buttery texture and loads of hidden carbs
customer_reviews.text: I like a couple of the other flavors. This flavor was too buttery and tasted slightly stale. Additionally, I wrote a review on their homepage. GoMacro only publishes good reviews apparently. If you give them a 2 star, they don't publish it. So unethical and decieving to the customer. Shame on you GoMacro
customer_reviews.author: Wansy

customer_reviews.title: Delicious. Excellent. and Nutritious!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh these bar are the best ever 😍 tastes so delicious and it's nutritious. 😋 We think the Oatmeal/Chocolate is the best (ioo)! Though we haven't try them all yet. Only a few.. (bought from stores near me) Right now we are trying the mocha/chocolates. It taste really yummy.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Vegan Protein Bar!
customer_reviews.text: GoMacro Bars are hands down my favorite protein bar. I love that they're vegan - and delicious! I can't have chocolate, so I've only tried a few of the flavors, but my favorite is the peanut butter. It's like eating the best peanut butter cookie - that also keeps you full for a few hours. So good! I carry one in my purse at all times, so I don't make bad food choices if I'm out and about and get hungry or feel like my blood sugar is getting low. Buying by the case is a great deal, too!
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Delicious, great source of protein, more of a snack/candy bar-not meal replacement.
customer_reviews.text: Delicious. I love these, especially the peanut butter-chocolate chip, the cherry, apple, cashew butter with carob. I will always have them in my cabinet for a snack. They are snacks only, but good protein and very tasty. Be careful about eating these as meal replacement bars. I really don't know anything about glycemic index, but I get super hungry a few hours after eating these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazn Artist

customer_reviews.title: Good, but I'm afraid of chipping my teeth.
customer_reviews.text: I like these, but I am always afraid I'm going to chip my teeth on them, as they have hard bits throughout them. I think that the hard things are oatmeal hulls. I just bought some at Trader Joe's and they seem to be softer and they don't have as many hulls in them (I don't think I found any in the three I ate from there so far). Maybe it was just a bad batch?
customer_reviews.author: Maria Bockus

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: They are expensive but they are the best tasting protein bars out there that don't have all kinds of weird ingredients. I switched from RX Bars to them because they just taste so much better!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff W.

customer_reviews.title: Grab and go bar
customer_reviews.text: I got these as they appeared to be gluten free. They taste great and were easy to toss in my bag and take with me. Unfortunately, I am not convinced they are gluten free as my intestinal tract disagreed. So I am back on the hunt for a good, tasty grab and go treat! If you don't need to be gluten free, then these are delish!
customer_reviews.author: Micky Cox

customer_reviews.title: Only received 8 bars.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this product twice this month. First shipment was fine. Second one only had 8 bars and box appeared tampered with. I am throwing away the bars. Shipment box was fine so appeared to have been shipped like that.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene

customer_reviews.title: Tons of sugar
customer_reviews.text: Way too much sugar, not a good choice for a protein bar. I've never actually seen something call itself a protein bar with this much sugar in it before.
customer_reviews.author: Telanis

customer_reviews.title: These are better than most bars on many levels – simple ingredients
customer_reviews.text: These are better than most bars on many levels – simple ingredients, relatively low sugar, big on taste. However, they've become too sweet for me over time. We've switched to making homemade peanut-butter-oat bars with half the sugar. If you haven't visualized added sugar before, it's worth doing. Take a food scale and weigh out 11 grams of white sugar, and you'll see what you're eating per bar (about 1 tablespoon.)
customer_reviews.author: Erik Pettee

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: I won’t be purchasing these again! Every bar I have eaten has had whole chunks of hard nuts. It’s not enjoyable to eat, AT ALL! This is the first time purchasing from Amazon, usually when I get them elsewhere they’re amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Mallozzi

customer_reviews.title: It actually tastes very good!
customer_reviews.text: I was always searching for a protein/snack bar that wasn't terrible on my taste buds. I like to eat pretty clean and healthy most of the time. I heard about these bars from a health coach that I admire and decided to give them a go. I've re-ordered several times now and always carry them in my purse for a snack. They are really tasty!!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Not the bar for me
customer_reviews.text: I have quite a few food allergies and it's hard to find a good tasting bar that doesn't have almonds, chocolate, strawberry, or wheat. I found one I like, but it is rarely available any more, so I've been searching for a replacement. Unfortunately this bar won't be it. It is very chewy and not as pleasant to eat.
customer_reviews.author: Restfinder

customer_reviews.title: Stale and tasteless
customer_reviews.text: This order was received stale and tasteless. It cannot be returned. I had to make two calls to Amazon. Second call I got a customer service rep, Mary, who helped me and issued a gift card for the amount of purchase. Beware.
customer_reviews.author: PAC

customer_reviews.title: SO delicious
customer_reviews.text: I love this flavor! It honestly tastes more like a sweet treat than a typical protein bar. I don’t feel as bad when I am craving something sweet and reach for one of these knowing the ingredients are much better than other options.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Yummy, but expensive
customer_reviews.text: These are Low-FODMAP compatible, so I eat a lot of them. They're reasonably tasty. Unfortunately, they're very expensive. I buy them here, in bulk, to get a bit of a discount, as the in-store prices are ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Sparky

customer_reviews.title: Product was in perfect condition
customer_reviews.text: No issues with packaging and delivery bars were all sealed and in good condition! Love the sunflower chocolate flavor! Will ordering again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brightpink In LA

customer_reviews.title: The best flavor by far
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite flavor of the macro bars. They are soft and delicious, very filling and satisfying without being overly sweet. These have a high amount of protein and keep you feeling full for a long time. I always keep them in the house!
customer_reviews.author: Tara P.

customer_reviews.title: favorite flavor
customer_reviews.text: This is my husband's favorite gomacro flavor. They are the perfect mid morning or afternoon snack, perfect to eat at work. I always looks for foods that have ingredients that are actual food and natural.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy C

customer_reviews.title: Low Fodmap MUST HAVE
customer_reviews.text: Perfect to keep in my bag in case I go somewhere I can't eat anything (Low FODMAP diet can be rough!). I eat this every morning for breakfast when I dont have time to make an omelet. I wish it were cheaper, but case deals and subscribe and save are almost decent.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Nell

customer_reviews.title: Yummy and Low FODMAP
customer_reviews.text: These bars are yummy: soft and chewy and sweet--but not too sweet--they make a tasty and filling low-FODMAP snack. Peanut butter and chocolate are a perfect combination. In spite of their soft, chewy texture, they don't leave teeth grungy. Conveniently portable.
customer_reviews.author: Tina B.

customer_reviews.title: Hallelujah for unrefined sugar!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely cannot express enough how thankful I am to find a vegan protein bar that doesn't use refined or fake sugars. This is a perfect processed food if you want a protein and sugar jolt snack on the go that doesn't spoil in your bag all day.
customer_reviews.author: Salina

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: I usually eat one for breakfast during the work week and if I'm running around and need a meal. One bar keeps me satisfied for 3-4 hours. My favorite flavor is Protein Pleasure peaanut butter and chocolate chips.
customer_reviews.author: Petscanner

customer_reviews.title: Quality Control Problems
customer_reviews.text: Used to think these bars were great, until the most recent box arrived. Found a huge piece of plastic in one of the bars that nearly cracked my tooth. It's alarming that a company that prides itself on its ingredients has such severe quality control issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just buy them!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! These are really good! I was fully expecting it to taste bland and be disgusting like most bars are (in my opinion) but these are a real game changer! Love them and they taste amazing. It’s in your best interest to buy some and test them out for yourself.
customer_reviews.author: KBR

customer_reviews.title: Satisfying and full of protein.
customer_reviews.text: GoMacro has some great bars. These have become a favorite it our house. They are chewy and the flavor holds up to the description. I like to keep these on hand for when cravings hit because they have a good punch of protein, but also satisfy my sweet tooth with the chocolate chips.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Soft chewy heaven
customer_reviews.text: Delicious peanut buttery goodness. Keep you full and energized. These ones in particular make me super thirsty, which makes me fuller since it forces me to drink more water! If you need texture like crunch however this probably isn't the bar for you, since these are soft and chewy. I personally love having rich, firm but soft bites so these are perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Isabel

customer_reviews.title: These are yummy!
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite of all of the macrobars!! Almond butter is a good change, got a little burned out on peanut butter flavor. I'm a snacker, not always too good at bothering with a meal. I feel like these are at least a healthy choice!!
customer_reviews.author: Lauri Gador

customer_reviews.title: My favorite bar, hands-down!
customer_reviews.text: Basically my go to bars. I eat one almost every morning and this is definitely my favorite flavor. Low sugar count, all-natural, gluten-free, etc., etc. LOVE these bars. Oh and they do fill me up in the morning until lunch, which is rare for a bar, especially of its size!
customer_reviews.author: Jules99

customer_reviews.title: Love these bars!
customer_reviews.text: Great price, bars are very fresh and this is my favorite flavor...I eat a bar before exercising 3x a week......I keep buying box after box, month after month because this is the lowest price anywhere and delivery was super fast with Amazon Prime...
customer_reviews.author: Marly

customer_reviews.title: I love these bars
customer_reviews.text: I love these bars , however, they are a little high in sugar and really expensive - even if you buy in bulk....I find they are freshest if you just order from them- a few shipments from other places just weren't as soft and fresh and since there is really no price savings just order directly.
customer_reviews.author: Wisco gal

customer_reviews.title: GoMacro Protein Bars are the BEST
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many protein bars and the Go Macro's are the best. They are expensive but worth every penny. Most of the flavors are pretty good but my all time favorite is Oatmeal Chocolate Chip.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Rose

customer_reviews.title: My go to
customer_reviews.text: These are my go to before my 5am workouts. Easy on the stomach, give me the kick I need, great taste, and easy to eat while driving. My kids have also eaten them in a pinch, I was okay with that since it’s all quality ingredients, and they enjoyed them. The box that they come in is eco friendly, which is wonderful to see!
customer_reviews.author: McSwizzler

customer_reviews.title: My staple.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been having these bars for breakfast for a long time. I used to buy them from the grocery store but it’s so much easier to just get a case from amazon. I love them. They’re dense and tasty. Mildly sweet. Nothing too crazy. I definitely feel full after eating one too.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Chewy and yummy and natural
customer_reviews.text: What more can I say? I'll keep buying these things. Recommended if you like energy bars that are more brown rice syrup than figs or dates.
customer_reviews.author: Mark P.

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST!
customer_reviews.text: In love these things SO much. Usually just for a quick breakfast, but I take them on all of my trips too. The best flavor, consistency and keep me full. I recommend them to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: jyav

customer_reviews.title: Stale and bland
customer_reviews.text: I've had these bars before (purchased locally), and they didn't taste like the ones I received. The ones I've bought locally were moist and flavorful; these were dry, bland, and a bit stale-tasting. Their expiration date says March 2019 so I don't know what the deal is - maybe it's how they were stored? I'd recommend these bars in general, just not from here.
customer_reviews.author: C.S.

customer_reviews.title: Best bar on the market.
customer_reviews.text: Having tried many protein bars over the years, I would say this is the best all around bar on the market to my knowledge. Very good taste and not overly sweet (the banana and almond happens to be my favorite). Doesn't have artificial sweetener and thus does not have the weird aftertaste. It is very hardy and "sticks to your ribs" so it will actually hold you over if you need it for that purpose. It's vegan and organic with excellent ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great Taste
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure these bars aren't some people's cup of tea but I love them as a great non-dairy option. The chocolate chips add a bit of sweetness and they are super filling.
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: TASTE AWFUL!
customer_reviews.text: These taste horrible! I was looking for a good tasting, nutty protein bar, and these are definitely not what I wanted! They are soft and just awful. Do not buy these!
customer_reviews.author: meredith skutches

customer_reviews.title: Healthy & Affordable Snack
customer_reviews.text: Like: -Soft and chewy -Packs protein -Healthy alternative to snacking -Discount on subscription pricing Dislike: -Can have a little too much sugary taste from the chocolate chips -Price is ok relative to other health bars but still somewhat high
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: GREAT protein meal for athletes
customer_reviews.text: Bought favorite flavor (Banana Chocolate Chip). Taken 2.5 hours before a competitive or practice athletic event, it keeps you energized through to the finish of the event.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Smith

customer_reviews.title: My favorite bar!
customer_reviews.text: This is my go to bar. In fact, i don't even bother buying any other bars anymore. This perfectly fits my FODMAP diet and i enjoy them for breakfast, as a meal replacement, or even an evening treat. Quality is always consistent and i have never been disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Best bar on the market, Order arrived quick
customer_reviews.text: Our favorite bar on the market. Our go to snack. We are both athletes and coaches, and love this product for our nutrition plan. The product shipped and arrived quick to our home.
customer_reviews.author: slyguy

customer_reviews.title: Best Protein Bars
customer_reviews.text: Arrived early, delicious and fresh. I expected them to taste old since they were unavailable for a while. They were surprisingly fresh. Chewy, subtle sweetness, chunky peanut granola bar.
customer_reviews.author: Elisabeth Goldberg

customer_reviews.title: Price keeps going up
customer_reviews.text: I like these bars. Mostly because they are organic and taste decent. I wish they had less sugar in them tho. I've had some flavors be really stale in past orders. I also don't appreciate the price hike recently.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah S.

customer_reviews.title: So good, so healthy.
customer_reviews.text: My favorite vegan bars by far. Love them with a cup of coffee. This is my favorite flavor but do like the others as well. Have a healthy taste but not an artificial taste.
customer_reviews.author: Madolyn83

customer_reviews.title: Banana almond butter best flavor
customer_reviews.text: The banana flavor is my favorite! Some of the varieties lack flavor, which I sacrifice for the ingredients. It is hard to find bars that are organic, dairy, and soy free. These have great sugar content and decent amount of protein. The banana almond butter have the most flavor. So happy to have found this brand. I recommend to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: BEP

customer_reviews.title: Eat this bar for breakfast every day
customer_reviews.text: I eat this bar every day for breakfast to get a protein boost in the morning. There are no artificial ingredients, so no odd tastes. I love peanut butter the best, and it has a gentle peanut butter flavor, with none of the stickiness of eating plain peanut butter.
customer_reviews.author: CYL311

customer_reviews.title: Tasty but too much sugar
customer_reviews.text: A good snack for on the go, but that’s an awful lot of sugar for something that is trying to appeal to the healthy market.
customer_reviews.author: Angitech

customer_reviews.title: Received a box full of rock-hard bars
customer_reviews.text: I am a big GoMacro fan but every bar in the box I received was rock hard, like they are old or something. I've purchased many GoMacro bars before and they are usually firm but chewy. Very disappointed in what I received.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful snack fot those tough days
customer_reviews.text: Is a little dificult find good and healthy snaks, so when I find this bars I found the perfect snack for those days when you don't have much time and need to avoid starving
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting low sodium bar!
customer_reviews.text: I eat these every day for breakfast. What drew me to this product was the low sodium content and the taste made me a loyal buyer. Other flavors are also fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: jsb

customer_reviews.title: I love GoMacro bars and this flavor tastes good but the ...
customer_reviews.text: I love GoMacro bars and this flavor tastes good but the reason I am giving this product 2 stars is that it arrived pretty stale. Typically GoMacro bars are very soft when I've received them from Amazon and various grocery stores before, so it is quite disappointing to get stale bars, especially since these aren't exactly cheap. Hopefully this is just a one time thing but I am definitely going to be rethinking ordering these from Amazon again.
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: Hard Pieces in Bar
customer_reviews.text: I have bought these bars in the past and really liked them. This time the bars that were shipped to me had extremely hard pieces I think of oats in them. It was so hard it hurt one of my teeth when I bit down. It is a shame because they taste so good.
customer_reviews.author: Howard Morgan

customer_reviews.title: A Delicious And Healthy Snack
customer_reviews.text: This is a great snack (we use as meal replacement sometimes) bar that is delicious and satisfying. What I really like is that it's rather simple, like the Larabar. There is not a bunch of processed junk in it. We've tried almost all of the GoMacro bars; they're all very good but this is our favorite flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Josmarcas

customer_reviews.title: Tastes like meh and has  expected protein bar texture
customer_reviews.text: These are good for protein, but I prefer to enjoy my food a little more. The texture is that overly chewy, almost gritty, taffy-like feel that a lot of protein bars have. The taste was just...bland.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: There are better bars
customer_reviews.text: I didn't love this bar. It's not got a lot of flavor, and it's not very sweet. It might be OK if you want "food as fuel". I tried this because I was looking for a low FODMAP bar. I discovered that I like Rachel Paul's Happy Bars better (try the Peanut Chocolate Euphoria flavor); they are low FODMAP and gluten-free, so worth a try if you're looking for a bar of that sort.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymouse

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting macro bar!
customer_reviews.text: Great tasting bar! The price is competitive with what we have seen in stores and the same day shipping was really nice. These are filling and don't taste like cardboard like a lot of other replacement bars.
customer_reviews.author: Rickie

customer_reviews.title: Peanut butter chocolate chip Bars
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant on ordering the peanut butter and chocolate chip flavor because of all the negative reviews on the product being expired and not getting enough quantity. I received my package this morning and was extremely happy that I received it in good condition with all 12 bars as stated in the description and none of the bars were expired. This is my favorite flavor of the go macro protein bars. Thank you a very happy customer!
customer_reviews.author: Ambra

product_meta.title: GoMacro MacroBar Organic Vegan Protein Bars - Peanut Butter Chocolate Chip (2.4 Ounce Bars, 12 Count)
product_meta.description:
Flavor Name:Peanut Butter Chocolate Chip| Pattern Name:Protein BarsRefuel with vegan certified protein bars from GoMacro. Made with organic peanut butter and fair-trade chocolate chips, this delicious and healthy snack contain 12 grams of plant-based protein.
combining whole-food nutrition and tasty flavor combinations, GoMacro MacroBars provide the fuel you need to do what you love without sacrificing taste. With a simple ingredient list of foods you can find in your kitchen, they're easily digested and won't weigh you down. Whether you're a Hiker, busy mother of 3, or a business entrepreneur, don't get stuck worrying about food. We all have a life worth living. Go life. GoMacro.
feature_bullets: Protein pleasure: our original peanut butter Chocolate Chip macrobar combines plant-based protein with organic Creamy peanut butter, chopped roasted peanuts, and organic, fair-trade chocolate chips!

Plant-based protein: granola bars, Vegan cookies, Keto snacks, or vegan jerky are nice, but GoMacro Plant-Based Protein bars deliver delicious taste in a satisfying bar that will give you a healthy energy boost.

Plant-based nutrition: whether you're looking for vegan Protein bars, Vegan snacks, or just a delicious bar with vegan chocolate, GoMacro Organic, high protein bars are a guilt-free snack you can enjoy anywhere.

We're big on taste: Our list of Certifications is also really big. Certified Organic, Vegan, Gluten-Free, Kosher, Non-GMO, C.L.E.A.N., greena.With., soy-free, and if there were a certification for delicious, we’d have that too!
Bigger than a bar: GoMacro is environmentally conscious, mother-daughter owned, and made with positive, plant-based ingredients, bringing positive Change for those hungry for it, one bar at a Time.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
